"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-bd54-45b6-2022-761b3ad32231#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Andrea della Robbia: Szentháromság oltár, 15. század eleje, Székesegyház, Arezzo, 370x260 cm, majolika.</string>
            <string language="en">Andrea della Robbia: Altar of the Holy Trinity, the beginning of the 15th century, cathedral, Arezzo, 370x260 cm, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andrea della Robbia: Altar der heiligen 
Dreiheit, der Anfang des 15. Jahrhunderts, Kathedrale, Arezzo, 370x260
Zentimeter, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Della Robbia d'Andrea : Autel de la 
trinité sainte, le début du 15ème siècle, cathédrale, Arezzo, 
370x260 centimètre, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Della Robbia de Andrea: Altar do trinity 
holy, o começo do 1ö século, catedral, Arezzo, 370x260 cm, 
maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Della Robbia di Andrea: Altar della 
trinità santa, l'inizio del quindicesimo secolo, cattedrale, Arezzo, 
370x260 centimetro, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Della Robbia της Andrea: Βωμός της ιερής
τριάδας, η αρχή του 15$ου αιώνα, καθεδρικός ναός, Αρέζο, 
370x260 εκατ., maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Della Robbia de Andrea: Altar de la 
trinidad santa, el principio del décimo quinto siglo, catedral, 
Arezzo, 370x260 centímetro, maiolica.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szentháromság megjelenítése, antropomorfizált Istennel.</string>
            <string language="en">Representation of the Holy Trinity with an anthropomorphic god</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szentháromság,  Krisztus,  Szentlélek,  Isten,  uralkodás,  trón,  15. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">the Holy Trinity, Christ, the Holy Ghost, God, reign, throne, 15th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der heiligen Dreiheit mit einem 
anthropomorphen Gott</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Représentation de la trinité sainte avec un dieu 
anthropomorphe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respresentação do trinity holy com um deus 
anthropomorphic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresentazione della trinità santa con un dio 
antropomorfico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιπροσώπευση της ιερής τριάδας με έναν ανθρωπόμορφο
Θεό</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Representación de la trinidad santa con un dios 
antropomorfo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die heilige Dreiheit, Christ, der heilige Geist, Gott, 
Herrschaft, Thron, 15. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la trinité sainte, le Christ, l'ordinateur de secours 
saint, Dieu, règne, trône, 15ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o trinity holy, Christ, o ghost holy, deus, reino, 
throne, 1ö século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la trinità santa, Christ, il fantasma santo, dio, 
regno, throne, quindicesimo secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ιερή τριάδα, Χριστός, το ιερό φάντασμα, Θεός, 
βασιλεύει, θρόνος, 15$ος αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la trinidad santa, Cristo, el fantasma santo, dios, 
reinado, trono, décimo quinto siglo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
